title: A Hugging Face Project Is Uncovering DeepSeek-R1’s Secrets
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Open-R1 is a project to answer questions about DeepSeek-R1 and R1-Zero. Here's what the research team has learned and created to date.
cntitle: Hugging Face 项目正在揭示 DeepSeek-R1 的秘密
cndescription: Open-R1 是一个旨在解答关于 DeepSeek-R1 和 R1-Zero 相关问题的项目。以下是研究团队迄今为止的学习成果和创作内容。
